Factsheet

Developer:
BitSmudge
Based in Grand Rapids, MI
Release date:
Platforms:
iOS App Store
Website:
bitsmudge.com/games/flarts
Regular Price:
USD Free

Description

Flarts is a quirky game about angles, accuracy, and avoidance. Take aim and launch your Flart (flying + dart = Flart) through precision based, obstacle-filled levels. Pop piñatas and aim for a bullseye on the Flartboard. Stretch your thumbs and jump into this quick arcade-style game. Controls are simple, but Flarts is sure to challenge!

History

Features

  • 90 levels to test your Flart flinging skills.
  • Challenge a friend to a high score match.
  • Unlock some fancy hats and glasses.
  • Climb up the leaderboards.
